  • Method Details

    • hasCollection

      public boolean hasCollection​(java.lang.String collectionName)
      Check if our database has a collection with the same name. If it does, it means we cannot create a game with the same name, since we want the game names to be unique
      Parameters:
      collectionName - collection name

    • openCollection

      public void openCollection​(java.lang.String player1, java.lang.String player2)
      Opens a new collection for a new game
      Parameters:
      player1 - First player's name
      player2 - Second player's name

    • updatePlayerInfo

      public void updatePlayerInfo​(java.lang.String playerName, java.lang.String changedValue, java.lang.String newValue)
      Updates game state on collection
      Parameters:
      playerName - Name of the player that will be updated
      changedValue - The data that will be updated
      newValue - The new value of the data

    • dropCollection

      Deprecated.
      Drops collection
